comment: Alternate definition of the universal class. Actually, the current definition ~ df-v should be proved from this one, and ~ vex should be proved from this proposed definition together with ~ bj-vexw , which would remove from ~ vex dependency on ~ ax-13 (see also comment of ~ bj-vexw ). (Contributed by BJ, 30-Nov-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
